title: Immuno 150 vs Balance of Nature vs Ens Supergreens: Which is Best?
author: Kelsey Cooper
description: Explore our expert comparison of Immuno 150, Balance of Nature, and Ens Supergreens. Make an informed choice for your health today.
cleaned_text: Are you struggling to pick between Immuno 150, Balance of Nature, and Ens Supergreens? It's not as straightforward as it seems to find the right nutrition supplement for you, so we've conducted thorough research to see how they compare. We'll guide you through each product, along with their formula, potential benefits, and how they stack up. Whether you're new to dietary supplements or seeking to switch, we'll equip you with the knowledge to choose the best product for your health goals. After our research, we recommend [Ens Supergreens](https://ensosuperfoods.com/products/supergreens#superfoods) as the top supplement to deliver quality nutrition and an enjoyable experience. Now, let's dive deeper into these three products so you can see for yourself. [Immuno 150 Overview](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C7792811?crid=7YG4OYBHKE09&keywords=Immuno+150+Daily+Body%2C+Mind+and+Immune+System+Support%2C+150+Caplets+%28Pack+of+1%29&qid=1686086993&sprefix=immuno+150+daily+body%2C+mind+and+immune+system+support%2C+150+caplets+pack+of+1+%2Caps%2C353&sr=8-1&ufe=app_do%3Aamzn1.fos.f5122f16-c3e8-4386-bf32-63e904010ad0&linkCode=ll1&tag=supergreens09-20&linkId=07785af467360de5035a992caff38b4e&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) [Immuno 150](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C7792811?crid=7YG4OYBHKE09&keywords=Immuno+150+Daily+Body%2C+Mind+and+Immune+System+Support%2C+150+Caplets+%28Pack+of+1%29&qid=1686086993&sprefix=immuno+150+daily+body%2C+mind+and+immune+system+support%2C+150+caplets+pack+of+1+%2Caps%2C353&sr=8-1&ufe=app_do%3Aamzn1.fos.f5122f16-c3e8-4386-bf32-63e904010ad0&linkCode=ll1&tag=supergreens09-20&linkId=07785af467360de5035a992caff38b4e&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) is a multivitamin supplement with a lengthy ingredient list. The company claims its capsules can promote optimal health, energy, and happiness, but you must take five to meet the daily recommended serving size. [What Is Immuno 150?](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C7792811?crid=7YG4OYBHKE09&keywords=Immuno+150+Daily+Body%2C+Mind+and+Immune+System+Support%2C+150+Caplets+%28Pack+of+1%29&qid=1686086993&sprefix=immuno+150+daily+body%2C+mind+and+immune+system+support%2C+150+caplets+pack+of+1+%2Caps%2C353&sr=8-1&ufe=app_do%3Aamzn1.fos.f5122f16-c3e8-4386-bf32-63e904010ad0&linkCode=ll1&tag=supergreens09-20&linkId=07785af467360de5035a992caff38b4e&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) As its name implies, [Immuno 150](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C7792811?crid=7YG4OYBHKE09&keywords=Immuno+150+Daily+Body%2C+Mind+and+Immune+System+Support%2C+150+Caplets+%28Pack+of+1%29&qid=1686086993&sprefix=immuno+150+daily+body%2C+mind+and+immune+system+support%2C+150+caplets+pack+of+1+%2Caps%2C353&sr=8-1&ufe=app_do%3Aamzn1.fos.f5122f16-c3e8-4386-bf32-63e904010ad0&linkCode=ll1&tag=supergreens09-20&linkId=07785af467360de5035a992caff38b4e&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) is a blend of over 150 different ingredients, including trace minerals, amino acids, super fruits, and herbs. It's exceptionally high in vitamins A, C, B6, B12, and more, with servings significantly exceeding the daily recommended amounts. Immuno 150 is designed to support your immune system health and protect against free radical damage, owing to its substantial vitamin and antioxidant content. Immuno 150 claims to support several critical organs, like the brain and heart, and rejuvenate the body. The product is plant-based, non-toxic, Kosher certified, and third-party tested, but none of the ingredients are organic per the nutrition label. Immuno 150 also comes with a 60-day money-back guarantee effective five days after it ships. Pros - Comprehensive mix of plant-based nutrients - Supports immunity and overall health - Multiple purchase options Cons - Five capsules equal one serving - Doesn't target gut health and digestion - Unclear sourcing methods and company information Bottom Line: [Immuno 150](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C7792811?crid=7YG4OYBHKE09&keywords=Immuno+150+Daily+Body%2C+Mind+and+Immune+System+Support%2C+150+Caplets+%28Pack+of+1%29&qid=1686086993&sprefix=immuno+150+daily+body%2C+mind+and+immune+system+support%2C+150+caplets+pack+of+1+%2Caps%2C353&sr=8-1&ufe=app_do%3Aamzn1.fos.f5122f16-c3e8-4386-bf32-63e904010ad0&linkCode=ll1&tag=supergreens09-20&linkId=07785af467360de5035a992caff38b4e&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) appears to be an impressive dietary supplement on the surface, but you must take several capsules daily, undermining the product's convenience. Additionally, the company could provide more evidence for the quality of its ingredients and where they are sourced. [Balance of Nature Overview](https://www.amazon.com/Balance-Nature-Vegetable-Supplement-Tablets/dp/B082P9FRLS?crid=ESGPK337RFTN&keywords=balance+of+nature&qid=1686087047&sprefix=Balance+%2Caps%2C300&sr=8-4-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzSVlFR0ExOEtVTTlQJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMjQ5MDQ2Mk5QSE5HVDNWTktBSyZlbmNyeXB0ZWRBZElkPUEwMjEyNDY4MUtCOE4xUVcyTlJCMyZ3aWRnZXROYW1lPXNwX2F0ZiZhY3Rpb249Y2xpY2tSZWRpcmVjdCZkb05vdExvZ0NsaWNrPXRydWU%3D&linkCode=ll1&tag=supergreens09-20&linkId=e27133e1dbd92609c43014ae3c31b5a7&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) Founded by Dr. Douglas Howard, [Balance of Nature](https://www.amazon.com/Balance-Nature-Vegetable-Supplement-Tablets/dp/B082P9FRLS?crid=ESGPK337RFTN&keywords=balance+of+nature&qid=1686087047&sprefix=Balance+%2Caps%2C300&sr=8-4-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzSVlFR0ExOEtVTTlQJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMjQ5MDQ2Mk5QSE5HVDNWTktBSyZlbmNyeXB0ZWRBZElkPUEwMjEyNDY4MUtCOE4xUVcyTlJCMyZ3aWRnZXROYW1lPXNwX2F0ZiZhY3Rpb249Y2xpY2tSZWRpcmVjdCZkb05vdExvZ0NsaWNrPXRydWU%3D&linkCode=ll1&tag=supergreens09-20&linkId=e27133e1dbd92609c43014ae3c31b5a7&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) is a dietary supplement brand that offers fruit and veggie supplements as well as fiber and spice capsules, each with unique benefits. The company has been in business for nearly 30 years and has become one of the most well-known nature supplements brands. [What Is Balance of Nature?](https://www.amazon.com/Balance-Nature-Vegetable-Supplement-Tablets/dp/B082P9FRLS?crid=ESGPK337RFTN&keywords=balance+of+nature&qid=1686087047&sprefix=Balance+%2Caps%2C300&sr=8-4-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzSVlFR0ExOEtVTTlQJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMjQ5MDQ2Mk5QSE5HVDNWTktBSyZlbmNyeXB0ZWRBZElkPUEwMjEyNDY4MUtCOE4xUVcyTlJCMyZ3aWRnZXROYW1lPXNwX2F0ZiZhY3Rpb249Y2xpY2tSZWRpcmVjdCZkb05vdExvZ0NsaWNrPXRydWU%3D&linkCode=ll1&tag=supergreens09-20&linkId=e27133e1dbd92609c43014ae3c31b5a7&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) [Balance of Nature's best-selling product](https://www.amazon.com/Balance-Nature-Vegetable-Supplement-Tablets/dp/B082P9FRLS?crid=ESGPK337RFTN&keywords=balance+of+nature&qid=1686087047&sprefix=Balance+%2Caps%2C300&sr=8-4-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzSVlFR0ExOEtVTTlQJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMjQ5MDQ2Mk5QSE5HVDNWTktBSyZlbmNyeXB0ZWRBZElkPUEwMjEyNDY4MUtCOE4xUVcyTlJCMyZ3aWRnZXROYW1lPXNwX2F0ZiZhY3Rpb249Y2xpY2tSZWRpcmVjdCZkb05vdExvZ0NsaWNrPXRydWU%3D&linkCode=ll1&tag=supergreens09-20&linkId=e27133e1dbd92609c43014ae3c31b5a7&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl), Fruits and Veggies, is a blend of 16 fruits and 15 vegetables that are preserved with a cold vacuum process. The capsules contain whole food ingredients, like apple, spinach, and garlic, with only fifteen calories and low carbohydrates per serving. Its Fiber and Spice supplement can support regular digestion with a mix of seeds and ground spices. The nutrition labels don't specify the exact vitamin and mineral contents for either product, but they are free of GMOs, gluten, and artificial ingredients. Both supplements are available with Balance of Nature's Whole Health System bundle, or you can purchase them separately. They also come with a 30-day satisfaction guarantee and subscription savings, but subscribers must pay an extra "one-time member fee." Pros - Contains all-natural fruits, vegetables, and whole foods - Experienced company with a good reputation - Easy to use and tasteless - Vegan-friendly, non-GMO, and gluten-free Cons - Doesn't specify the ingredient and nutrient contents - You need both products to get the nutrients and digestive benefits - High cost even with a subscription Bottom Line: [Balance of Nature](https://www.amazon.com/Balance-Nature-Vegetable-Supplement-Tablets/dp/B082P9FRLS?crid=ESGPK337RFTN&keywords=balance+of+nature&qid=1686087047&sprefix=Balance+%2Caps%2C300&sr=8-4-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzSVlFR0ExOEtVTTlQJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMjQ5MDQ2Mk5QSE5HVDNWTktBSyZlbmNyeXB0ZWRBZElkPUEwMjEyNDY4MUtCOE4xUVcyTlJCMyZ3aWRnZXROYW1lPXNwX2F0ZiZhY3Rpb249Y2xpY2tSZWRpcmVjdCZkb05vdExvZ0NsaWNrPXRydWU%3D&linkCode=ll1&tag=supergreens09-20&linkId=e27133e1dbd92609c43014ae3c31b5a7&language=en_US&ref_=as_li_ss_tl) offers a line of dietary capsules with whole food ingredients, but they are expensive compared to other brands. And without specified nutritional values, it's unclear what the product really delivers. [Ens Supergreens Overview](https://ensosuperfoods.com/products/supergreens#superfoods) Ens Superfoods offers a few kinds of greens powders, and [Ens Supergreens](https://ensosuperfoods.com/blogs/supergreens) is the company's best-seller. This everyday supplement boosts immunity, improves digestion, and enhances energy levels with the help of over 20 organic superfoods. [What Is Ens Supergreens?](https://ensosuperfoods.com/products/supergreens#superfoods) Ens Supergreens is unique [superfoods](https://ensosuperfoods.com/blogs/supergreens/what-are-superfoods) like nopal cactus, dulse, moringa, and others. It also 5 billion CFUs of probiotics and a digestive enzyme blend, which are the ingredients that improve digestion and overall gut health. Despite its density of greens, [Ens Supergreens](https://ensosuperfoods.com/products/supergreens#superfoods) has a palatable minty flavor that is among the best we've tried, even though it doesn't contain sugar or artificial sweeteners. It's also free of gluten, animal byproducts, caffeine, and nuts, so it accommodates a variety of dietary restrictions. Because of Ens Supergreens' energizing properties, many users prefer to use it in the morning to maximize the effects throughout the day. Most note considerable improvements and feel healthier, likely because of the high-quality ingredients. Ens Supergreens is third-party tested and manufactured in U.S. GMP-certified facilities, ensuring its potency and purity. Plus, it comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're unsatisfied. Pros - Strong lineup of organic superfoods and nutrients - Great taste that doesn't need extra mixers - Free shipping and generous satisfaction guarantee - Targets digestion, immunity, and energy - All-natural with no artificial ingredients or flavors Cons - Only available on Ens Superfoods' website - No travel packs for on-the-go use Bottom Line: [Ens Supergreens](https://ensosuperfoods.com/products/supergreens#superfoods) is an excellent all-around greens powder that makes it easier to bridge daily nutrition gaps. Its pleasant flavor and high-quality ingredient list stand out, making it one of the few greens powders with both qualities. Health Benefits Analysis Each brand offers unique benefits due to their varying formulas, but they also have some advantages in common. Here's how they compare: Natural Energy Boost These supplements' high vitamin and mineral contents can support metabolism, thereby supporting daily energy levels. However, Balance of Nature doesn't list its supplements' nutritional values, so it's impossible to know the extent to which it improves energy. On the other hand, Immuno 150 and Ens Supergreens contain high levels of B vitamins. According to [PubMed Central](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7019700/), B vitamins help extract energy from food and improve cognitive function. In addition, Ens Supergreens specifically targets energy with its formula of superfood ingredients. Digestion and Gut Health Ens Supergreens is the only supplement with probiotics and digestive enzymes, which encourage healthy [gut bacteria growth](https://www.hsph.harvard.edu/nutritionsource/microbiome/) and regulate digestion. Balance of Nature's Fiber and Spice blend contains eight grams of fiber (29% of the daily recommended amount), which also helps with digestion. While Immuno 150 may indirectly support digestion due to its nutrients, it doesn't contain fiber or focus on gut health. Immune System Support Immuno 150 and Ens Supergreens are designed to support [immune health](https://ensosuperfoods.com/blogs/supergreens/what-vitamin-is-good-for-immune-system) and have a leg up on Balance of Nature, primarily because of their antioxidant and nutrient content. Balance of Nature may have similar effects since it contains various fruits and vegetables, but it's hard to gauge without knowing the exact amounts inside. Because Ens Supergreens promotes gut health, it may provide the best immune-boosting effects. According to UCLA's [Dr. David Heber](https://www.uclahealth.org/news/want-to-boost-immunity-look-to-the-gut), the gut is home to 70% of the immune system, making it a critical area for optimal immune function. Overall Health All three brands can improve overall health by providing essential nutrients that help us function and feel our best. While Immuno 150 and Balance of Nature offer substantial health benefits, Ens Supergreens stands out with its targeted approach. It contains various superfoods with clear nutritional values, indicating how it can bridge dietary gaps in your daily routine. Taste Comparison Balance of Nature and Immuno 150 are capsules, so they don't have any flavor. This makes these brands an attractive option for those who [dislike the taste of greens](https://ensosuperfoods.com/blogs/supergreens/how-to-make-super-greens-powder-taste-better) or want something more convenient. On the other hand, Ens Supergreens has a distinct light minty taste owing to its peppermint leaf content. It's not a particularly strong mint flavor (like a breath mint), but it adds some freshness to cover up the bitter taste of greens. Most customers enjoy drinking it and think it's one of the better-tasting greens powders on the market, even if only mixed with water. Yet, it's versatile enough to include in smoothies, salad dressings, or other recipes. Ingredients Breakdown It's essential to choose a supplement that has the right ingredients and credible sourcing methods. Here's how the brands' ingredients compare. Immuno 150 Ingredients Immuno 150 claims to have 70 plant-based trace minerals and 80 added nutrients. It doesn't contain sugar, wheat, shellfish, animal byproducts, or gluten. Notable components include: - 18x amino acids - 17x herbs - 17x antioxidants - 12x vitamins (contains well over the recommended amounts of vitamins A, C, D, E, B6, B12, and folate, among others) - 9x fruits - CoQ10 The blend has unique ingredients like elderberry, acai, Korean ginseng extract, and aloe vera, but the exact amounts of each aren't specified. Additionally, the ingredients aren't organic, and Immuno 150 doesn't explain how or where their ingredients are sourced. Balance of Nature Ingredients The fruit and vegetable supplement contains a mix of 16 fruits and 15 vegetables. Balance of Nature divides them into three blends per bottle: maintain, protect, and repair. The ingredients are relatively common, including tomatoes, grapes, celery, carrots, and kale. Its fiber supplement contains whole psyllium husk, flax seed, and over a dozen other spices, providing a third of your daily fiber intake requirement. Balance of Nature is vegan-friendly, non-GMO, gluten-free, and doesn't contain extracts or synthetic ingredients. While it doesn't have unique superfoods, Balance of Nature uses nutrient-dense whole foods that can support a healthy diet. However, the nutrition label doesn't list the amount per serving, so it's hard to say how much you get or ensure you're hitting your recommended daily values. Ens Supergreens Ingredients Ens Supergreens contains over 20 organic superfoods without GMOs, preservatives, or synthetic ingredients. Some of its noteworthy superfoods include: - Alfalfa: A nutrient-rich plant often used in herbal medicine, alfalfa contains essential vitamins and minerals such as vitamin K and calcium. It's often used to support digestive health, cholesterol levels, and general wellness. - Broccoli: This superfood is loaded with nutrients, including vitamins C and K, fiber, and antioxidants, supporting immunity and heart health. - Moringa: Also known as the "miracle tree," moringa can boost energy levels and support healthy skin due to its vitamin A, C, and E content. - Ginger root: This ingredient can reduce inflammation and help with nausea. Ginger root may also have potent antioxidant effects. Ens Supergreens also contains 5 billion CFUs of probiotics and a digestive enzyme blend. Importantly, it doesn't have sugar or stevia, making it one of the few greens powders with all-natural ingredients. Immuno 150 vs. Balance of Nature vs. Ens Supergreens Costs It's essential that you get the best value for your budget, so we'll compare each product's prices, subscription options, and perks. Immuno 150 Cost A bottle of Immuno 150 costs $54.95 and comes with 150 capsules, about $2.73 per serving (five capsules daily). The company doesn't offer the option to subscribe, but you can save up to 15% if you order multiple bottles. But to get the maximum discount, you must order twelve bottles for $46.71 each. Balance of Nature Cost The brand's Fruit and Veggie supplements cost $89.99 for a one-time purchase and include 30 servings of each, about $3 per serving. A subscription saves $20 and brings the price down to $69.95. The Fiber and Spice blend costs $69.95 and offers the same subscription discount. If you buy the products together, it costs $159.95 or $109.95 with a subscription. However, all Balance of Nature new subscribers must pay a $25 fee on top of the purchase price, but all orders come with free shipping. Ens Supergreens Cost Ens Supergreens costs $59.99 for a 30-serving pouch, which works out to $1.99 per serving. With a subscription, the price drops to $39.99 ($1.33 per serving), making it the most cost-effective option. And if you want 60 servings a month, it costs $69.99 and saves 42% over the one-time purchase price. All orders qualify for free shipping, whether a one-time purchase or subscription. Why Choose Ens Supergreens All products have advantages, but [Ens Supergreens](https://ensosuperfoods.com/products/supergreens#superfoods) is the most comprehensive supplement at a fair value. It's the only product that comes with all-natural and organic ingredients, digestive enzymes, and probiotics. It caters to more dietary preferences, including plant-based, gluten-free, and nut-free diets, and has credible manufacturing and sourcing methods. Supergreens has the lowest cost per serving, even without a subscription, but still delivers a range of unique superfoods. Although it's not quite as convenient as taking a capsule, Ens Supergreens is easy to mix with water and has an enjoyable flavor. With a generous satisfaction policy and helpful customer service, Ens Supergreens is worth a try. Whether you want to target a specific health area or improve your daily nutrition, Ens Supergreens is our top recommendation. Final Thoughts We've researched what goes into Immuno 150, Balance of Nature, and Ens Supergreens to give you a clear picture of what to expect with each product. When trying new dietary supplements, always start small and see how your body adjusts. Consistency is vital for improvement, so experiment with ways to integrate your chosen supplement into your daily routine. If you're ready to embrace a healthier lifestyle, Ens Superfoods' greens powder offers [nutrition
